name: New
descr: The property listing has been created but is not yet active or public.

name: Accepting Requests
descr: The listing is public and is now accepting inquiries or applications.

name: Reviewing Requests In Progress
descr: The property manager/owner is actively looking through received inquiries.

name: Viewings/Visits Planned
descr: Appointments for property viewings have been scheduled with potential tenants.

name: Shortlisting Requests
descr: The pool of candidates is being narrowed down to the most serious individuals.

name: Shortlisted
descr: The final few candidates have been selected for background checks and final processing.

name: Contract In Progress
descr: An offer has been accepted and the legal contract/lease agreement is being prepared.

name: Awaiting Sign Off
descr: The contract is ready and is waiting for the final signatures from all parties.

name: Rented
column4: and the property has been successfully leased.
